name: Wombutts
description:
*not available on mobile*

Wombutts is a 2D adventure game where you, the  ever-charismatic and brilliant adventurer,  avoid getting hurt by some very strong wombat butts in search of The Heart of the Caves.

Created by 

Jocelyn Gonzalez, https://twitter.com/jocelyngee

Wombat Sprite and Animation

Steve Brock and Oliver Duenas

Backgrounds and Tiles

Warped Caves, Unity Store

Player Sprite and Animation

BayatGames, Unity Store
